abstract: CF Industries Holdings announced that it had withdrawn its hostile offer to acquire Terra Industries, a rival fertilizer maker, ending this part of a long and complex merger battle.
snippet: CF Industries Holdings announced that it had withdrawn its hostile offer to acquire Terra Industries, a rival fertilizer maker, ending this part of a long and complex merger battle.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:12 p.m. CF Industries Holdings announced Thursday afternoon that it had withdrawn its hostile offer to acquire Terra Industries, a rival fertilizer maker, ending this part of a complex, yearlong takeover battle.

headline.main: CF Withdraws Terra Bid; Agrium Steps Up Efforts
